name: A Sticky Situation (Kani)
description:
Are your hands covered in jam or something? These boxes stick to you so hard, they even start sticking to each other!

A small puzzle game made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam! Theme: Joined Together.

Figure out a way to collect all the boxes and put them in the safe area. Rearrange rooms to find the solution. Try to have fun.

!! KINDA IMPORTANT – If the game doesn't work in your browser, try playing it here. If that too doesn't work, you're gonna have to download the executable file instead. There's really nothing I can do about this, that's just how the engine works with Itch's embedding.
